segments.text: Thank you for coming so quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A pipe in my apartment is leaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The pipe is in my bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me how long the pipe has been leaking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pipe has been leaking for a couple days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do realize that I will need to rip down your wall to get to the pipe , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I ’ m aware of that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just need the problem fixed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll get started on it now .
segments.speaker: S2
